|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = E2XSWL-1000D |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/15/1998 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Per a CII PC made 05/13/1999, '''Samsung''' swapped the HFA3724 to HFA3726, but the letter states.. :... '''these components are identical in their internal circuitry. It is more or less a nomenclature change.''' .. the mixer was also changed from an HFA3624 to an AT32032.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
